summary: A version of real world smith Pavel Moc\'s Embleton Style.
descriptionHtml:
As a novice swordsman I wanted to be able to use my favourite sword in game. So I created a version of real world smith Pavel Moc\'s Embleton Style. It has slightly more bulky proportions than in real life to better fit in to the world of Skyrim.


Location
========
Inside Breezehome in Whiterun.


Install
=======
1. Extract the archive in to your Skyrim data folder and chose to overwrite when prompted.
2. Play the game


Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Skyrim\\data\\meshes\\weapons\\pavelMoc\\embletonStyle...
Skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\pavelMoc\\embletonStyle...
Skyrim\\data\\textures\\cubemaps\\pavelMoc\\duncaveruinblue_e.dds


Incompatibility
===============
Might conflict with other mods that modify Breezehome (even though the only thing this mod does is adding a sword in to the livingroom)
author: gabbe_master
